column2:
series_classification_df6 <-
  series_classification_df5 |> 
  # rowid_to_column("id") |>
  pivot_longer(
    !series_class:release_date,
    # !series_class:release_date, 
    names_to = c(".value", "ja_variation"),
    names_pattern = "(.*)_(1|2)",
    # names_sep = "_", 
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  ) |> 
  select(-ja_variation, -)
